name: Jessica Xie
title: How NOT to DDOS Servers with Your Go Service
bio: Jessica Xie is a Software Developer at Shopify, Toronto, where she worked on various projects around the APIs with high throughput, low response time, and high availability, both on the server and client side. She studied Electrical and Computer Engineering at the University of Toronto. Previously, she worked as a Software Developer for Chango, an ad tech company that was bought by Rubicon Project. Chango's ad bidding systems handle more transactions while having a lower response time than Twitter.
